Denton.Guinn Hall:
Guinn Hall is a residence hall at Texas Woman's University, and is the tallest building in Denton, Texas. Named for the 6th president of Texas Woman's University (1950-1976) the co-ed dormitory faces University Avenue.
The building is 24 stories tall and it houses first time college students only, with each room made up of two to three occupational bedrooms each with its own private bathroom.
